transcript: I mean, I've been looking for jobs like three years and I can't get a job. I mean, like, it's America, right? I just be able to get a job.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean I've been looking for a job for like three years and I can't get a job.  I mean like, it's America, right?  I should be able to get a job.
